dump2.description: `Returns a string which makes `obj` human-readable, handles reference loops.

Raycast.description: A raycast on the map. It works with selection boxes.

Settings.description: An interface to read config files in the format of `minetest.conf`.

PseudoRandom.description:
A 32-bit pseudorandom number generator.
Uses PCG32, an algorithm of the permuted congruential generator family, offering very strong randomness.

SecureRandom.description: Interface for the operating system's crypto-secure PRNG.

VoxelArea.description: A helper class for voxel areas.

PerlinNoiseMap.description: A fast, bulk perlin noise generator.

PcgRandom.description:
A 32-bit pseudorandom number generator.
Uses PCG32, an algorithm of the permuted congruential generator family, offering very strong randomness.

ItemStack.description: An `ItemStack` is a stack of items.

AreaStore.description:
A fast access data structure to store areas, and find areas near a given position or area.
Every area has a `data` string attribute to store additional information.
